t: Amazon.com : Vero Vellini Wide Top Rifle Sling, Black Neoprene/Black Leather : Gun Slings : Sports & Outdoors
s: The Vero Vellini Wide Top Rifle Sling, in Black Neoprene/Black Leather is the perfect sling for rifles. This sling combines the comfort of neoprene with non-slip backing to keep you firearm from sliding off your shoulder. The lines of the sling are clean and neat which has become one of the trademarks of German craftsmanship. It's handmade with black leather and black stitching with the attention to detail you won't find in other brands...
